custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, CT_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN CT_TrackingActionInstance ON (CT_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) AND (CT_TrackingActionInstance.elementId = CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId) WHERE (CT_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId = ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC
